title: 8 tips for an eco-friendly kitchen remodel, according to pros | - Homes & Gardens
summary: To minimize environmental impact, sustainable kitchen renovations focus on longevity, repurposing older materials, using low VOC paints, and choosing sustainable materials like bamboo, cork, and recycled stone chips. Eco-friendly practices in kitchen remodeling include using reclaimed materials, incorporating old-world pieces, and opting for energy-efficient appliances and LED lighting. To promote sustainability, consider starting small by using eco-friendly appliances and making gradual changes over time.
